ScreenWidth = 1020
ScreenHeight = 680
-- hardware fullscreen MultiSample AntiAliasing(AA): 0 to disable;2 to enable;4 is better
MultiSampleType = 0
-- 0 default quality, 1 for higher quality. the higher value, the more quality
MultiSampleQuality = 0
-- default is editor/notepad.exe, UltraEdit is another good choice if one has it.
ScriptEditor = C:\Program Files\UltraEdit\uedit32.exe
-- initial game effect set, 0 is recommended. possible value is [1024, 0,1,2,-1,-2]. 1024 means FF, otherwise the larger the better.
GameEffectSet = 0
InverseMouse = false
-- possible values are enUS or zhCN
language = zhCN
